label: PocApp
peekOfCode:
class PocApp:
    def __init__(self, root):
        self.root = root
        self.root.title("POC App")
        self.root.geometry("400x300")
        # Input
        self.entry = tk.Entry(root, width=40)
        self.entry.pack(pady=10)
        # Save button
        self.save_btn = tk.Button(root, text="Save", command=self.save_item)

label: get_connection
init_db
peekOfCode:
def init_db():
    conn = get_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    cursor.execute("""
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS items (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            value TEXT NOT NULL
        )
    """)
    conn.commit()

label: insert_item
peekOfCode:
def insert_item(value):
    conn = get_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    cursor.execute("INSERT INTO items (value) VALUES (?)", (value,))
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()
def fetch_items():
    conn = get_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    cursor.execute("SELECT value FROM items ORDER BY id DESC")

label: fetch_items
peekOfCode:
def fetch_items():
    conn = get_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    cursor.execute("SELECT value FROM items ORDER BY id DESC")
    rows = cursor.fetchall()
    conn.close()
    return [r[0] for r in rows]
